title: U.S. Home Prices Rising Faster Than Expected
teaser: A closely-watched housing indicator released today showed home prices are rising around the country.
contentencoded:
A closely-watched housing indicator released today showed home prices are rising around the country. The S&P/Case-Shiller index of property values increased 5 percent for the second straight month, a faster pace than projected. But what does that mean for individual homeowners or buyers?

Guest

  • Christopher J. Mayer, professor of real estate at Columbia Business School.
